title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Positions in Lebanon Amid Ongoing Tensions”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked launch and observation positions of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in Lebanon.

Israeli Air Force fighter jets attacked a launch position of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the Marwahin area and an observation post used by the organization in the Hula area a short while ago.

During the last hours, several launches were identified in various areas of the Upper Galilee, and air defense fighters successfully intercepted some of the launches.

IDF forces attacked the sources of fire with artillery, alongside additional areas in Lebanon.

As a result of the launches fired at the area of Kiryat Shmona, two IDF soldiers were lightly injured and were evacuated for medical treatment at a hospital; their families were informed.
